title: Tree Loppers
content:
Tree Loppers are a piece of profession equipment for the Woodcutter profession that can be purchased in Timberwell Green from Morauce the Hatchet Man.

The Tree Loppers allow the the player character to lop various types of trees and requires level 20 in the Woodcutter profession to use. The lopping activity can be done offline but will require the investment of a knowledge points and baskets in the players inventory.

You will need 24 slot for the chop sticks to be 1 silver.
